newsitem.title: UK: Cobham rises after investor presentation.
newsitem.headline: Cobham rises after investor presentation.

text.p: Share in Cobham Plc advanced on Wednesday after the UK engineering group gave a generally upbeat investor presentation, dealers said.
At 1327 GMT, the shares were up 14p to 645-1/2p as the engineering sector, bucking the trend of the broader market, was steady to weaker.
The company was not immediately available to comment, but dealers said about 40 institutions and brokers attended the presentation.
"The word is that it went well and we're seeing a few buyers as a result" a dealer said. But he noted that volume was not heavy, with only 657,000 shares registered at 1327 GMT.
The stock rose sharply in April, scoring a record high at 671p on April 17, before falling back during the latter part of the month.
